content: baby snake is an original crochet pattern by june gilbank a small but perfectly proportioned no-sew baby snake the narrow body makes it easy to pose in a variety of realistic positions and you can make your snakes as long or short as you want make a baby snake in a single colour use a variegated yarn for easy colour patterning or combine it with my ultimate stripes technique 1 to make a tiny striped snake baby snake is designed to be a perfect miniature version of the snakes in my temperature snake 2 and snake collection 3 patterns see last 2 photos for size comparison and you can also use all the striping ideas from those patterns for your baby snakes **yarn ** small quantity of worsted weight yarn **hook ** e us/3 5mm **size ** approx 13-15 33-38cm long but you can make yours as long as you want by adding more repeats to the body your gauge and yarn choice will affect the finished size slightly **eyes ** 6mm **please note ** the rainbow-striped baby snake pictured in the 5th-8th photos here is **not** part of the free pattern this is a donationware pattern - the basic single colour snake pattern as shown in the first 4 photos here is available for free from the linked page but if you like it please consider sending me a donation to show your appreciation and to receive the exclusive bonus rainbow ombré pattern as part of the pattern pdf the pdf version available for any size donation from the link on the pattern s webpage also includes exclusive bonus content that you ll only find in the pdf version - the beautiful rainbow ombré version of the snake pattern that fades through a series of colours a classic rainbow or any other colour palette you want - additional tips instructions for managing the tiny eyes and choosing variegated yarns - the crochet instructions for the basic pattern are all included on one printer-friendly page so you can save paper and ink by printing only that page *** > ***please join us*** *in the planetjune crochet designs > group http //www ravelry com/groups/planetjune-crochet-designs > -
